description: Cancels Learning Course Offering with a Cancel Reason.
Cancels Learning Enrollment with a Cancel Reason.

Allows updating of effective-dated custom objects for Learning Course.  When updating                  custom objects that allow multiple instances, data for existing instances must appear                  in the request, otherwise it will be removed.

Allows updating of effective-dated custom objects for Learning Course Offering.  When                  updating custom objects that allow multiple instances, data for existing instances                  must appear in the request, otherwise it will be removed.

Allows updating of effective-dated custom objects for Learning Program.  When updating                  custom objects that allow multiple instances, data for existing instances must appear                  in the request, otherwise it will be removed.
Uses the Enroll in Content business process to enroll learners into learning content.

Retrieves specified External Learning Users given that all of them are valid for Unarchival                  or, if none specified, All External Learning Users who are valid for Unarchival. Valid                  External Learning Users are the ones which are archived and inactive workers.

This web service operation will retrieve instances of Custom Validation Context. The                  response contains the reference to the Custom Validation Context returned, the Label,                  and Classification. Each Custom Valdiation Context can contain many Custom Validations,,                  which are made up of Condition Items that make up the logic used in the Custom Validations                  for each Rule type. On the web service request, you can specify a specific reference                  to a Custom Validation Context to return.
Retrieves Equivalency Rules
Retrieve Extended Enterprise Affiliation(s).
Retrieve Extended Enterprise Job Profiles.
This operation retrieves Extended Enterprise Learner Types defined in the system.

Retrieves information about the specified Extended Enterprise Learners identified                  in the request. If the request doesn't specify the Extended Enterprise Learners, this                  operation retrieves information for all External Learners in the system. Workday recommends                  that you implement paging with your request, enabling you to manage the number of                  instances in one call.
Retrieve External Learning Instructors from references.

Information about the specified External Learning Users identified in the request.                  If the request doesn't specify the External Learning Users to return, contains information                  for all External Learning Users in the system.
Retrieves instructors.

Information about the specified Learner Group Rules identified in the request. If                  the request doesn't specify the Learner Group Rules to return, contains information                  for all Learner Group Rules in the system.

Information about the specified Learner Group Rules without dependencies identified                  in the request. That is, if a Learner Group Rule is composed of other Learner Group                  Rules then only the first level is returned. If the request doesn't specify the Learner                  Group Rules to return, contains information for all Learner Group Rules in the system.

Information about the specified Learner Pricing Rules identified in the request. If                  the request doesn't specify the Learner Pricing Rules to return, contains information                  for all Learner Pricing Rules in the system.
Retrieves assessors.
Retrieves blended courses.
Retrieves Learning Catalogs.
Retrieves Learning Certification Rules
Retrieve Learning Content Subscriptions.
Retrieves blended course offerings.
Enables retrieval of custom objects for learning course offerings.
Enables retrieval of custom objects for the learning blended and digital courses.
Retrieves digital courses.
Returns all Learning Enrollment Pricing Records if none specified, otherwise returns                  specified Learning Enrollment Pricing Records
Retrieves enrollments.
Retrieves Imported Contents.
Retrieves Imported Records. Some domains securing this web service don't allow constrained                  groups. Example: The Reports: Learning Record domain.
Retrieves standalone lessons.
Retrieves learning navigation items.
Create or Update a Learning Organization Payment Configuration
Retrieves other unit types for digital and blended courses.
Retrieves Learning Page Items by Reference ID, or retrieves all Learning Page Items                  if no Reference ID is provided.
Retrieves Learning Prerequisite Rules
Enables retrieval of custom objects for learning programs.
Retrieves Learning Programs.
Returns Learning Security Category by Name. Returns all Learning Security Category                  if no Name is provided.
Returns Learning Topic Security Segments by Reference ID, or returns all Learning                  Topic Security Segments if no Reference ID is provided
Retrieves Learning Spotlight Cards by reference ID or retrieves all Learning Spotlight                  Cards when no reference ID is provided.
Retrieves topics.
Retrieve Learning Vendor
Retrieves Media Settings for Media

This service operation will add or update Sales Items. Sales items are goods and services                  which a company sells.  Sales Item data includes  Sales Item ID, Item Name, Revenue                  Category, Item Description, Item Identifier, Unit of Measure, Unit Price, Currency,                  Tax Applicability, Sales Item Group. The request criteria can be for a single transaction                  based on Reference, or all transaction can be retrieved if no criteria is specified.
Retrieve Training Credit Mappings
Loads bulk learning enrollments.
Updates External Learning Users if Archived set to False. This can be done only for                  the External Learning Users who are archived and have inactive workers.
Uses the Manage Course Offering business process to schedule and make changes to course                  offerings.
Updates or creates Equivalency Rules. Uses the Manage Equivalency Rule business process.
Initiate the Manage Extended Enterprise Learner Business Process to create or update                  an Extended Enterprise Learner.
Create and edit External Learning Instructors via the BP: Manage Learning Instructor.
Create and edit External Learning Users via the BP: Manage External Learning User.
Updates or creates instructors.
Updates or creates Learning Certification Rules. Uses the Manage Learning Certification                  Rule business process.
Updates or creates blended and digital courses. Uses the Manage Course business process.
Updates or creates Learning Prerequisite Rules. Uses the Manage Learning Prerequisite                  Rule business process.
Updates or creates Learning Programs. Uses the Manage Learning Program business process
Updates or creates standalone lessons. Uses the Manage Lesson business process

This web service operation will add or update Custom Validation Rule. A Custom Validation                  Rule contains a Label and Classification. Each Custom Valiation Rule can contain many                  Condition Rules, which are made up of Condition Items that make up the logic used                  in the Custom Validations for each Rule type.
Create or Update an Extended Enterprise Affiliation.
Create or Update an Extended Enterprise Job Profile.

Updates or creates legacy enrollments.

Updates or creates Learning Imported Content.
Updates or creates imported records.
Creates or updates learning navigation items.
Create or Update a Learning Organization Payment Configuration
Updates or creates other unit types for digital and blended courses.
Creates or updates a Learning Page Item with the information supplied in the request.
Creates a new Learning Security Category (or updates an existing Learning Security                  Category) with the information supplied in the request.
Creates a new Learning Topic Security Segment (or updates an existing Learning Topic                  Security Segment) with the information supplied in the request.
Creates or updates a Learning Spotlight Card.
Updates or creates topics.
Create or Update a Learning Vendor.
This Web Service is Update only - It updates the Media Settings for a specific Media
